flawed_nl_solution:
81/3 = <<81/3=72>>72 students are wearing checkered shirts.
72 x 2 = <<72*2=144>>144 students are wearing striped shirts.
72 + 19 = <<72+19=91>>91 students are wearing shorts.
144 - 91 = <<144-91=53>>53 more students are wearing striped shirts than shorts.
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
